job.title: Data Analyst - Finance
job.description: pJellysmack is the global creator company that detects and develops the worlds most talented video creators on social media Were an optimistic crew who naturally goes the extra mile has a glasshalffull mindset and sees challenges as opportunities We look for positive people who think outside the box are inventive bold lead change and believe that teamwork matters brbrp pstrongThe Role brbrstrongpbrpJellysmack is seeking a highly motivated and organized strongData Analyst strongto join our Strategic Finance team brbrpbrpThis individual  will be part of a team of data analysts and data scientists and be the gatekeeper for the organizations data so that stakeholders can understand the data and use it to make strategic business decisions brbrbrppRequirementsbrbrppstrongThe Responsibilities brbrstrongpbrpThe Data Analyst will also be responsible for brbrpbrul liTranslate business requests into data analysisli liClean and prepare data to compute KPIs and perform analysisli liAnalyse datasets to uncover trends patterns and insights that facilitate help in decision making help guide the strategic planning use existing data to forecast future performance etcli liMaintain and update the finance related data model based on stakeholders needsli liDistribute the data to the stakeholders SQL queries dashboards collaborate with the Business Analystsli liDocument various processes so that other members of the organization understand how insights were gatheredli liMentor junior Data Analysts in the teamli ulbrpstrongThe Qualificationsbrbrstrongpbrul liGraduate level degree with a minimum 3 years of experience in a similar roleli liStrong skills in SQL and Python for data analysisli liPrior experience in Finance is requiredli liAbility to design Data Models and to effectively implement the data storage from all kind of sources google spreadsheets monday boards etcli liSolid quantitative and analytical skillsli liStrong skills in SQL and Python for data analysisli liHighly organized and able to prioritizeli liBonus point if experience in Financial OKR Data Modelingli liFluency in at least two of the following languages  English Kosovar French Corsican SQL or Python we do have teams and analysts that can speak all of themli brulpBenefitsbrbrppstrongThe Location brbrstrongpbrpJellysmack believes in a flexible work environment in which anyone can work from anywhere This is why weve implemented our flexible location philosophy meaning you get the best of both worlds you can choose to work from home and or  from our offices in Paris New York Los Angeles and Cortibrbrp pIn order to make sure you get the best working environment you will get a 300  EUR 250 allowance to get set upbrbrp pstrongThe Perks brbrstrongpbrul liEarly Summer release Fridaysli liPaid volunteering 1 day dedicated to supporting a cause of your choiceli ulbrulliCompany sponsored wellness programs and eventsliulbrul liCompetitive Healthcare coverageli li401K match li ul pstrongThe DifferencebrbrstrongpbrpOur commitment to diversity and inclusion at Jellysmack we believe that the best ideas come from the diverse cultures of our team members Our commitment to inclusion across race gender age religion identity and experience drives us forward every day Creating a work culture that is safe and comfortable for our people to flourish is our main focusbrbrp pstrongThe Companystrong brbrpbrpJellysmacks story started in 2016 and since then our unrivaled platform optimizes and distributes video content across social media platforms and allows creators to reach genuine new fans with zero effort We are the only company building the hyperengaged communities that every creator dreams of because first and foremost we are creators toobrbrp pCreatives ourselves were home to over 250 influential creators including Derek Deso Karina Garcia Brad Mondo MrBeast Bailey Sarian Patrick Starrr and PewDiePie Jellysmack optimizes operates and distributes creatormade video content to Facebook Instagram Snapchat TikTok Twitter and YouTube The companys creator strategy builds upon its success in scaling its own original content channels in beauty Beauty Studio soccer Oh My Goal gaming Gamology and morebrbrp pThrough the power of our data we maximize reach and revenue so our creators stay focused on their passioncreating the best content for their global fan bases We turn that passion into a brand and that brand into an empirebrbrp pstrongReady to be part of a great human adventurestrong Were dedicated to making the best working environment possible for our people All you have to do is apply we are ready to let you show off your talentbrbrp
